mapper.insert: insert into calendar ( calendar_no, calendar_writer, calendar_title, calendar_content, calendar_start, calendar_end ) values (#{calendarNo}, #{calendarWriter}, #{calendarTitle}, #{calendarContent}, to_date(#{calendarStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), to_date(#{calendarEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))
mapper.select: select * from calendar order by calendar_no desc
select g.grade_name from calendar c join emp e on c.calendar_writer = e.emp_no join grade g on e.grade_no = g.grade_no where c.calendar_no = #{calendarNo}
